page.title: 19ST.WENN PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: There are{two classrooms}in the {school,}infants and juniors.In the juniors class there are eighteen pupils and in the infants there are sixteen{.Mrs Smyth}teaches the Infants and{Mr Hodder,the Headteacher,}works with the Juniors.{Mrs Ward}helps to teach one afternoon a week. We have one{play gound}and a{school {field}with play bars and sand pit. The school is over{130 years old. There were plans to{close it down in {recent years.}There was a hole in the roof and pupils had to be taught in the W.I.Hall. Other plans to close the school have met with{fierce local {opposition}and have gained national sympathy. School dinners come by car from{St {Columb.}Mrs Nicholls,our caretaker and dinner lady serves them.Mrs Liddicoat is our secretary and meal supervisor.
